mapper.insert:
insert into t_reassign_task_detail(REASSIGN_TASK_NO,TASK_INFO_NO,CUST_NO,CUST_NAME,task_type,before_User,new_User,
uuid ) (
select #{item.reassignTaskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as REASSIGN_TASK_NO, #{item.taskInfoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as TASK_INFO_NO, #{item.custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as CUST_NO, #{item.custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as CUST_NAME, #{item.taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as task_Type, #{item.beforeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as before_User, #{item.newUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as new_User, #{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as uuid from dual
)
